data.description:
A highly realistic and advanced physics-based hockey simulation that features:

- Support for play using your real hockey stick! Up your game and visit https://www.melcher.ca/HockeyVR to purchase Realstick, the optional controller mount that attaches your controller to your real hockey stick. Realstick is not required to play.
  {476694761905603}
- Advanced virtual reality puck and stick physics using Unreal Engine.
- 3 game types: Choose between Time Trial, Limited Shots, or One-Timer modes.
- 3 unique environments: Small Town Arena, Mountain View, and Snowy Forest.
- 3 difficulty levels: Empty net, corner targets, or face-to-face against an AI goalie that watches your every move!
- Choice of left- or right-handed stick and one- or two-handed control schemes.
- Shot-Assist option to help hone your skills.
- Local Leaderboard: Compare scores against friends for bragging rights.

changelog.change_log:
This update includes a new one timer game mode and some quality of life improvements to the other modes to allow faster puck spawning.

Change list:

* Added new one timer game mode for added difficulty.
* Added progress bar to visualize when and where a puck will spawn to all game modes.
* Added the ability to tap the ice with the VR stick and Realstick as an input method.
* Added ability to tap 3 times on the ice to spawn a puck immediately. This will allow users to adjust the speed of puck drops to suit their play style. Works with VR controllers and Realstick.
